sense.gloss: to get cloudy, to cloud over, to become overcast
to cloud up, to fog up, to mist up, to become dim
to be gloomy, to be clouded (expression), to be downcast
to look slightly downward (of a noh mask; indicating sadness, grief, etc.)

sdata.j: マスクをつけると↑眼鏡↑↓めがね↓が|↑曇↑↓くも↓る|。
sdata.e: When I wear a mask, my glasses get steamed up.

sdata.j: マスクをつけると↑眼鏡↑↓めがね↓が|↑曇↑↓くも↓る|。
sdata.e: When I wear a mask, my glasses fog up.
